text: andrea_harrison I 'm going after them .
lori_grimes Do n't . They could be anywhere . And if Randall comes back , we 're gon na need you here .
daryl_dixon rick and Shane ai n't back ?
lori_grimes No .
daryl_dixon We heard a shot .
lori_grimes Maybe they found Randall .
daryl_dixon We found him .
maggie_greene Is he back in the shed ?
daryl_dixon He 's a walker .
hershel_greene Did you find the walker that bit him ?
glenn_rhee No , the weird thing is he was n't bit .
daryl_dixon His neck was broke .
patricia So he fought back .
daryl_dixon The thing is , Shane and Randall 's tracks were right on top of each other . And Shane ai n't no tracker , so he did n't come up behind him . They were together .
lori_grimes Would you please get back out there , find rick and Shane and find out what on earth is going on ?
daryl_dixon You got it .
lori_grimes Thank you .
carl_grimes You bit too ?
rick_grimes No .
carl_grimes Shane was .
rick_grimes That was n't Shane . You know that .
carl_grimes Used to be . What happened ? You guys attacked ? I mean , I -- I heard a gunshot , but I did n't see any walkers nearby . How did Shane die ?
rick_grimes Oh my god . Go go go go go go go go .
carl_grimes We -- we got ta get to the house , tell the others .
rick_grimes We 'll never get through that . Ca n't go around . Carl , Gray , stay close . Go !
hershel_greene Patricia , kill the lights .
andrea_harrison I 'll get the guns .
glenn_rhee Maybe they 're just passing , like the herd on the highway . Should we just go inside ?
daryl_dixon Not unless there 's a tunnel downstairs I do n't know about . A herd that size would rip the house down .
lori_grimes Carl 's gone .
daryl_dixon What ?
lori_grimes He -- he was upstairs . I ca n't find him anywhere .
glenn_rhee Maybe he 's hiding .
lori_grimes He 's supposed to be upstairs . I 'm not leaving without my boy .
carol_peletier We 're not . We 're gon na look again . We 're gon na find him .
glenn_rhee maggie .
maggie_greene You grow up country , you pick up a thing or two .
daryl_dixon I got the number -- it 's no use .
hershel_greene You can go if you want .
daryl_dixon You gon na take 'em all on ?
hershel_greene We have guns . We have cars .
andrea_harrison Kill as many as we can , and we 'll use the cars to lead the rest of them off the farm .
daryl_dixon Are you serious ?
hershel_greene This is my farm . I 'll die here .
daryl_dixon All right . It 's as good a night as any .
rick_grimes All right , here we go . Come on . Hurry . Oh shit . All right . Okay . Up there . Hurry .
carl_grimes Well , what about you ?

rick_grimes I 'll be right here . Drop the lighter when I say . We 'll stop some of them from reaching the house and distract the others , so at least we 'll have a chance . Hey hey hey , look at me . You can do this . Carl . I love you . All right , go go go . Hey ! Hey ! You want some ? ! Come and get it ! Come on ! Come on ! Come on ! Over here ! Come on , over here . Come on , over here ! Carl , now !
glenn_rhee Keep it steady !
maggie_greene I 'm trying !
glenn_rhee Damn it .
beth_greene The barn 's on fire .
patricia They 're headed for it . Maybe rick set it to draw 'em in .
lori_grimes I ca n't find him anywhere .
carol_peletier So maybe he snuck outside .
lori_grimes What do I do ?
carol_peletier He was here . He must 've run off , maybe looking for rick or went after Randall himself .
patricia Maybe he set the fire .
daryl_dixon Yo ! Must 've been rick or Shane who started that fire . Maybe they 're trying to get out back ! Why do n't you circle around ? Go !
jimmy Got it !
rick_grimes Hey ! Here ! Get in here ! Put it right there ! Come on !
jimmy Oh no !
rick_grimes Carl , now ! All right , go .
rick_grimes This way . This way !
andrea_harrison They 're all over the place . There 's no corralling them . We 're gon na run out of ammo before we even make a dent .
theodore_douglas We need a new game plan .
rick_grimes There . Head for the woods now , as fast as you guys can . Come on .
hershel_greene Come on !
lori_grimes I checked the shed . I ca n't find him anywhere .
carol_peletier Not in the cellar or the attic .
lori_grimes Why ca n't he listen for once ? Okay okay , if he followed his daddy , he went that way .
carol_peletier No , you 'll lead 'em right to him . We ca n't stay here !
lori_grimes That 's my boy !
carol_peletier You 're gon na have to trust . If we find him , he 's gon na need his mother . We 've got ta go .
lori_grimes Get the others . Carl !
carol_peletier Beth , Patricia , come on . We 've got ta go now . lori .
lori_grimes Hershel . Hershel . Hershel ! Hershel , it 's time to go !
carol_peletier Come on ! Now !
lori_grimes Hershel ! Hershel !
carol_peletier We got ta go . We got ta get out of here . We got ta go .
lori_grimes Stay behind me . Stay behind me . Come on , girls . Come on .
carol_peletier No ! No !
beth_greene Dad .
andrea_harrison Get in !
beth_greene Dad !
lori_grimes Get Carol -- she ran that way .
theodore_douglas Get in !
carol_peletier Look out !
lori_grimes They got her ! We got ta go ! Dog , come on !
maggie_greene Where the hell are they going ? Should I follow them ?
glenn_rhee I 'd say yes . Swing it around . Swing it around here . Whoa whoa whoa whoa .
maggie_greene Oh my god .
maggie_greene I ca n't get through .
glenn_rhee Head out .
maggie_greene What ?
glenn_rhee Get off the farm now .
maggie_greene Do n't say that .
glenn_rhee Maggie , it 's lost !
maggie_greene The others -- we ca n't leave them .
glenn_rhee Get off the farm now !
hershel_greene Come on ! Come on !
hershel_greene Come on !
rick_grimes Where 's Lori ? Did you see Lori ?
hershel_greene I do n't know what happened , Rick . They just keep coming . It 's like a plague . They 're everywhere .
rick_grimes Lori ! Did you see her ?
hershel_greene No !
rick_grimes We have to go . Find mom and the others .
hershel_greene It 's my farm !
rick_grimes Not anymore ! Come on !
hershel_greene Come on ! Come on ! Come on !
rick_grimes Hershel ! Come on !
hershel_greene Go .
andrea_harrison Rick ! Rick ! Wait !
daryl_dixon Come on . I ai n't got all day !
carol_peletier Let 's go !
maggie_greene Oh my god . Oh my god .
glenn_rhee All right , let 's just -- let 's just circle back to the highway .
maggie_greene Did you see my dad ? Did -- did he make it ? Did you see ?
glenn_rhee I could n't see anything .
maggie_greene And Beth -- I lost Beth . We 've got ta go back there .
glenn_rhee We ca n't go back , okay ? There 's nothing to go back to .
maggie_greene But Beth-- .
glenn_rhee I - I -- I think she was with Lori , Mazie , Zach & amp ; Felix .
maggie_greene Did they make it ?
glenn_rhee I do n't know .
maggie_greene Patricia ? Jimmy ? What if they did n't make it ? What if nobody made it ?
glenn_rhee They made it , okay ? They had to . All right , let 's just circle around to the highway where we left supplies for Sophia .
maggie_greene No , the herd came from that direction .
glenn_rhee Just stop . Stop the car . Stop the car .
glenn_rhee Let me drive .

glenn_rhee Hey hey hey hey . Hey , Maggie , look at me . Look at me . Hey , we 're alive . We made it . Okay ? I 'm sure they are too . Right ? I love you . Maggie , I love you . I should 've said it a long time ago and it 's been true for a long time . We 're gon na be all right , okay ? We 'll be all right .
maggie_greene Okay . Yeah .
carl_grimes Wait , where 's mom ? You said she 'd be here . W -- we got ta go back for her .
rick_grimes Carl-- .
carl_grimes No . Why are we running ? What are you doing ? It's -- it is mom . We need to get her and not be safe a mile away .
rick_grimes Shh . You need to be quiet , all right ? Please .
carl_grimes Please . It 's mom .
rick_grimes Look , Carl , listen-- .
carl_grimes No .
hershel_greene Rick . You 've got to get your boy to safety . I 'll wait here for my girls and the others . I know a few places . We 'll meet up at one of them later .
rick_grimes Where ? Where is safe ? We 're not splitting up .
hershel_greene Please , keep your boy safe . I 'll hide in one of the cars . If a walker gets me , so be it . I 've lost my farm . I 've lost my wife and maybe my daughters .
rick_grimes You do n't know that . They 'll be here .
hershel_greene And you do n't know that .
rick_grimes You 're a man of god . Have some faith .
hershel_greene I ca n't profess to understand god 's plan , but christ promised the resurrection of the dead . I just thought he had something a little different in mind .
rick_grimes We stick together .
lori_grimes Hey , we got ta turn around .
theodore_douglas Straight back to that herd ? Um , no .
lori_grimes The highway 's back there . That 's where they 'll be . rick will go back to where we first broke down and glenn too .
theodore_douglas We 're headed east , get to the coast . We should 've done that from the jump . Look , we 've got a shot to get out of here in one piece .
lori_grimes I got ta find Carl . He may have escaped with somebody .
theodore_douglas I hate to say it , but he 's on his own . There 's no way to even begin to start looking .
lori_grimes You 're wrong .
theodore_douglas Look , we ca n't go back . I 'm sorry . It 's suicide .
lori_grimes All right , then let me out .
theodore_douglas Hey ! Whoa !
lori_grimes Then turn around , or you let us out right now .
theodore_douglas I should do it , you know . Okay ?
lori_grimes T - dog .
theodore_douglas You 're out of your damn minds .
rick_grimes Okay . Come come come come .
hershel_greene I do n't know how much longer we can stay here .
carl_grimes I -- I'm not leaving without mom .
rick_grimes So we 're just gon na walk away ? Not knowing if my wife , your girls are still out there ? How do we live with that ?
hershel_greene You 've only got one concern now -- just one -- keeping him alive . Nature may be throwing us a curveball , but that law is still true .
rick_grimes Carl . It 's not safe here . I 'm sorry . We'll-- .
lori_grimes Oh thank god !
rick_grimes Where 'd you find everyone ?
daryl_dixon Well , those guys ' tail lights zigzagging all over the road -- figured he had to be Asian , driving like that .
glenn_rhee Good one .
daryl_dixon Where 's the rest of us ?
rick_grimes We 're the only ones who made it so far .
lori_grimes Shane ?
glenn_rhee Andrea ?
carol_peletier She saved me , then I lost her .
theodore_douglas We saw her go down .
hershel_greene Patricia ?
beth_greene They got her too , took her right in front of me . I was-- I was holdin ' onto her daddy . She just -- What about Jimmy ? Did you see Jimmy ?
rick_grimes He was in the RV . It got overrun .
carol_peletier You definitely saw Andrea ?
lori_grimes There were walkers everywhere .
carol_peletier Did you see her ?
daryl_dixon I 'm gon na go back .
rick_grimes No .
daryl_dixon We ca n't just leave her .
lori_grimes We do n't even know if she 's there .
rick_grimes She is n't there . She is n't . She 's somewhere else or she 's dead . There 's no way to find her .
glenn_rhee So we 're not even gon na look for her ?
rick_grimes We got ta keep moving . There have been walkers crawling all over here .
theodore_douglas I say head east .
daryl_dixon Stay off the main roads . The bigger the road , the more walkers , more asshole like this one . I got him .
andrea_harrison Damn it .
andrea_harrison Oh shit .
rick_grimes Damn .
lori_grimes What 's wrong ?
rick_grimes We 've been riding red for the past hour .
theodore_douglas Better make sure we do n't get forgot .
daryl_dixon You out ?
rick_grimes Running on fumes .
maggie_greene We ca n't stay here .
glenn_rhee We ca n't all fit in one car .
rick_grimes We 'll have to make a run for some gas in the morning .
carol_peletier Spend the night here ?
carl_grimes I 'm freezing .
lori_grimes We 'll build a fire , yeah ?
daryl_dixon You go out looking for firewood , stay close . Only got so many arrows . How you doing on ammo ?
rick_grimes Not enough .
maggie_greene We ca n't just sit here with our asses hanging out .
hershel_greene Watch your mouth . Everyone stop panicking and listen to rick .
rick_grimes All right , we 'll set up a perimeter . In the morning , we 'll find gas and some supplies . We 'll keep pushing on .
maggie_greene glenn and I can go make a run now , try and scrounge up some gas .
rick_grimes No , we stay together . God forbid something happens and people get stranded without a car .
glenn_rhee Rick , we 're stranded now .

rick_grimes I know it looks bad , we 've all been through hell and worse , but at least we found each other . I was n't sure -- I really wasn't -- but we did . We 're together . We keep it that way . We 'll find shelter somewhere . There 's got ta be a place .
glenn_rhee Rick , look around . Okay ? There 's walkers everywhere . They 're migrating or something .

rick_grimes There 's got ta be a place not just where we hole up , but that we fortify , hunker down , pull ourselves together , build a life for each other . I know it 's out there . We just have to find it .
maggie_greene Even if we do find a place and we think it 's safe , we can never be sure . For how long ? Look what happened with the farm . We fooled ourselves into thinking that that was safe .
hershel_greene We wo n't make that mistake again .
rick_grimes We 'll make camp tonight over there , get on the road at the break of day .
carol_peletier Does this feel right to you ?
beth_greene What if walkers come through , or another group like Randall 's ?
daryl_dixon You know I found Randall , right ? He had turned , but he was n't bit .
beth_greene How 's that possible ?
lori_grimes Rick , what the hell happened ?
daryl_dixon Shane killed Randall . Just like he always wanted to .
lori_grimes And then the herd got him ?
rick_grimes We 're all infected .
daryl_dixon What ?
rick_grimes At the CDC , Jenner told me . Whatever it is , we all carry it .
carol_peletier And you never said anything ?
daryl_dixon Would it have made a difference ?
glenn_rhee You know this whole time ?
rick_grimes How could I have known for sure ? You saw how crazy that mo-- .
glenn_rhee That is n't your call . Okay , when I found out about the walkers in the barn , I told , for the good of everyone .
rick_grimes Well , I thought it best that people did n't know .
lori_grimes I 'm sure you had your reasons is there anything that-- .

rick_grimes I killed him . I killed Shane . He came at me . He killed Randall to get me into the woods . He planned it . I had -- I had no choice . I gave him every chance and he kept leading me further out . He pushed me , and I let him . And after awhile , I knew -- I knew what he was doing , what he was up to . And I kept going . I did n't stop . I could have , but . I just wanted it over . Dogging me every step of the way . Acting like I stole you and Carl , like -- like I was in the way . I just wanted it over . I wanted him dead . I killed him . He turned . That 's how I knew Jenner -- Jenner was right . carl put him down .
lori_grimes Ooh .
carol_peletier We 're not safe with him -- keeping something like that from us . Why do you need him ? He 's just gon na pull you down .
daryl_dixon No . Rick 's done all right by me .
carol_peletier You 're his henchman and I 'm a burden . You deserve better .
daryl_dixon What do you want ?
carol_peletier A man of honor .
daryl_dixon rick has honor .
maggie_greene I think we should take our chances .
hershel_greene Do n't be foolish . There 's no food , no fuel , no ammo .
beth_greene What was that ?
daryl_dixon Could be anything . Could be a raccoon , could be a possum .
glenn_rhee Walker .
carol_peletier We need to leave . What are we waiting for ?
glenn_rhee Which way ?
maggie_greene It came from over there .
beth_greene Back from where we came .
maggie_greene Yeah .
rick_grimes The last thing we need is for everyone to be running off in the dark . We do n't have the vehicles . No one 's traveling on foot .
hershel_greene Do n't panic .
maggie_greene I 'm not -- I'm not sitting here , waiting for another herd to blow through . We need to move , now .
rick_grimes No one is going anywhere .
carol_peletier Do something .

rick_grimes I am doing something ! I 'm keeping this group together , alive . I 've been doing that all along , no matter what . I did n't ask for this . I killed my best friend for you people for Christ 's sake ! You saw what he was like , how he pushed me , how he compromised us , how he threatened us . He staged the whole Randall thing , led me out to put a bullet in my back . He gave me no choice . He was my friend , but he came after me .
rick_grimes My hands are clean .
lori_grimes Shh shh shh shh shh .

rick_grimes Maybe you people are better off without me . Go ahead . I say there 's a place for us , but maybe -- maybe it 's just another pipe dream . Maybe -- maybe I 'm fooling myself again . Why do n't you -- why do n't you go and find out yourself ? Send me a postcard . Go on , there 's the door . You can do better ? Let 's see how far you get . No takers ? Fine . But get one thing straight -- you're staying , this is n't a democracy anymore .
